superheroes.name: batman
superheroes.info: Batman[a] is a superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics.

superheroes.name: superman
superheroes.info: Superman is a superhero who appears in American comic books published by DC Comics.

superheroes.name: wonder woman
superheroes.info: Wonder Woman is a superhero created by the American psychologist and writer William Moulton Marston and artist Harry G. Peter.
